main event: On June 8, 1963, a witness observed a bright, disc-shaped object hovering over Mesa, Arizona, emitting pulsating reddish-orange light.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter., The object remained stationary for several minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes., The weather was clear at the time of the sighting., The object could not be identified as a known aircraft or celestial body.
sighted object: bright, disc-shaped object emitting reddish-orange light
witness description: individual with no history of misidentification of aerial phenomena
